text.section: The Board may conduct a demonstration study to evaluate a proposed change to regulations regarding nursing practices or the activities of nursing assistants or medication technicians in a practice setting.

A demonstration study enables the Board, in a controlled practice setting, to determine:
The safety of the proposed practice or activity; and
The appropriate education or training requirements for a proposed practice or activity.

section.section:
The Board shall:
Approve the demonstration study design; and
Select the testing facilities.
The Board may waive selected nursing practice requirements during a demonstration study.
